Headline: G7 leaders pledge to share 1 billion COVID-19 vaccine doses in next year
Text: The Group of Seven nations will provide more than a billion coronavirus vaccine doses to aid global vaccination efforts over the next year, the leaders announced on the final day of the summit.Why it matters: The G7 nations have been criticized for not sharing their vaccines, particularly with countries that have struggled to contain new waves of the virus.Stay on top of the latest market trends and economic insights with Axios Markets.
